page.title: 19LIVING AND WORKING IN SAXTON
page.content: I get up at 7.00am every day and make breakfast straight away. I eat it downstairs. I like to have a cooked breakfast - bacon, egg and tomatoes and maybe sausages. I prepare my working son's packed lunch. Then I have a cup of coffee. I tidy up every day. In good weather I then go into the garden to work, but only at weekends. At quarter to twelve I go to my job in the school kitchen. I keep all the money I earn for myself. I have dinner at school. I have my tea at 5.00pm. I watch very little television as I don't really enjoy it. I run a club for young people at church twice weekly. My favourite food is roast lamb and mint sauce. My favourite drink is draught Guinness and beer, and a cup of tea. I go to bed about 11.00pm.
